h1_title: Where to use The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave can be used in conjunction with The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision, The Spirit of Captain-Wise Voice"), and The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion in The New West at the prisoner in the first cell at the base of the Pagoda Realm. With all of these items, you can return to the prisoner to obtain the Chubai Spearhead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'Where to use The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave can be used in conjunction with The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision, The Spirit of Captain-Wise Voice"), and The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion in The New West at the prisoner in the first cell at the base of the Pagoda Realm. With all of these items, you can return to the prisoner to obtain the Chubai Spearhead.
